settings.desc: Some love stories are written in the stars—others in RGB lighting and lightning-fast clicks. The OMEN 35L desktop delivers elite performance, while the HyperX Alloy Origins 60 and Pulsefire Haste 2 Wireless provide precise keystrokes and ultra-responsive aim. Whether you're grinding ranked or duo-queing for fun, this setup keeps you locked in.
The HyperX Pulsefire Haste 2 Pro 4K delivers next-level gaming performance as our first mouse with a true 4K polling rate.
Get a free Hextech Chest with every gaming PC, keyboard or mouse purchase.

settings.heading_text: Elevate Your Mouse, Lower The Friction
settings.desc: HyperX Glass Skates provide an instant upgrade to nearly any HyperX mouse.
HyperX QuadCast 2 S is a full-featured microphone designed with creators in mind.
HyperX Cloud MIX 2 is the next generation in the Cloud MIX series, redefining versatility in an over-ear design.
Clear multiple game campaigns without needing to charge, and enjoy every minute in comfort with Cloud Alpha Wireless’ plush HyperX signature memory foam and breathable leatherette ear cushions.

settings.heading: Hextech Chest Terms & Conditions
settings.footnote:
League of Legends Hextech Chest Terms and Conditions

1. Promotion Eligibility

- This promotion is valid only for purchases of HyperX
Keyboards, Mice, and OMEN PCs made through [uk.hyperx.com](https://uk.hyperx.com).

   - The promotion period starts on November
9, 2024, at 11:00 GMT and ends on December 9, 2024, at 23:59 GMT.

   - You will receive the in-game code via
the email address provided during your order.

2. Receiving Your Code

   - To receive the in-game code, you must
accept marketing communications when placing your order at checkout. Failure to
do so will result in not receiving the email with the code. 

3. Redemption Instructions

   - Step 1: Open the League of Legends game
client.

   - Step 2: Go to the "Store" and
click on "Account."

   - Step 3: Select "Redeem Codes."

   - Step 4: Insert the alphanumeric code and
click "Submit."

- For more information or support, please visit: [Riot Codes
FAQ](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202801810-Riot-Codes-FAQ).

4. Code Redemption Requirements

   - A Riot/League of Legends account is
required to redeem the code. You must be logged into your Riot account to
complete the redemption process.

- If you do not have a Riot/League of Legends account, visit
[Riot Games](https://www.riotgames.com/en) to sign
in or create a new account.

5. Code Usage

   - Each qualifying HyperX product purchased
during the promotional period entitles you to one (1) code per email/account,
while supplies last. Only one code is provided per email/account, per eligible
product purchase, while stock lasts.

   - The code is valid for a one-time use
only.

   - Code redemption is valid from November 09,
2024, to April 30, 2025.

   - The in-game item(s) redeemed with this
code are non-exchangeable, non-transferable, and have no cash alternative,
except as required by law.

    - HP is not responsible for any lost
or stolen in-game item codes.

   - HP reserves the right to change or
cancel this promotion at any time, acting reasonably and in accordance with
relevant laws and regulations.

By participating in this promotion, you agree to these Terms
and Conditions.

settings.heading: Title with Description
settings.footnote: * To access the DUO20 coupon code offer, please enter coupon code DUO20 at checkout on uk.hyperx.com to get additional 20% off at checkout. Please note that product exclusions apply: Omen Laptops, Omen Desktops, and Product Bundles are NOT eligible for this offer. The coupon code will expire on 14/02/2025 at 23.59 GMT. Single use per customer. Available whilst stocks last. Requires acceptance of Terms and conditions of Sales and Service. Purchases made using voucher code must be for personal use and not for resale. Coupon code is non-exchangeable, non-transferable and no cash alternative is offered, except as required by law. This coupon code cannot be used in conjunction with any other coupon code. HP is not responsible for lost or stolen coupon codes. HP reserves the right, acting reasonably and in accordance with all relevant legislation and codes of practice to change or cancel this offer at any time.
